headerDisplay: Alarm.com security system plugin using Node.js API

name.title: Name (REQUIRED)
name.description: The name that will appear in your homebridge log.

username.title: Username (REQUIRED)
username.description: Alarm.com login username, same as app.

password.title: Password (REQUIRED)
password.description: Alarm.com login password, same as app.

authTimeoutMinutes.title: Timeout to Re-Authenticate Session (OPTIONAL)
authTimeoutMinutes.description: (<u>WARNING:</u> choosing a time less than 10 minutes could possibly ban/disable your account from Alarm.com.)

pollTimeoutSeconds.title: <b>Device Polling Interval (OPTIONAL)<b>
pollTimeoutSeconds.description: (<u>WARNING:</u> choosing a time less than 60 seconds could possibly ban/disable your account from Alarm.com.)

armingModes.title:
Alarm.com arming modes (OPTIONAL).

Not all panels are compatible with silent arming. Enabling this without proper support will break thatt arming type.

ignoredDevices.title: Ignored Devices
ignoredDevices.description: IDs for Alarm.com accessories you wish to hide in Homekit. (OPTIONAL)
